snippet: Christopher S. Murphy, the victor in a bruising race for a Senate seat from Connecticut, has succeeded in risky races against powerful opponents.
abstract: Man in the News column profiles Christopher S Murphy, who won bruising race against Linda E McMahon for United States Senate seat in Connecticut; is latest success for the rising political star in risky races against powerful opponents.

byline.contributor: Elizabeth Maker contributed reporting from Roxbury, Conn.

lead_paragraph: Christopher S. Murphy, the victor in a bruising race for a Senate seat from Connecticut, has succeeded in risky races against powerful opponents.

headline.seo: Murphy, Connecticut’s New Senator, Is a Young Star Who Keeps Rising
headline.main: A Young Star Rises Again, to the Senate
headline.print_headline: A Young Star Rises Again, To the Senate
headline.content_kicker: Man in the News | Christopher Scott Murphy
